title: Paris F.C. Set Tickets To $0. Should Others Do the Same?
excerpt: When Paris F.C. made its tickets free, it began an experiment into the connection between fans and teams, and posed a question about the value of big crowds to televised sports.

title: The Art of Profitability by Adrian Slywotzky
excerpt: This is a book summary of The Art of Profitability by Adrian Slywotzky. Read The Art of Profitability summary to review key ideas and lessons from the book.
